snippet.title: Create a Python script in VSCode using Copilot Inline Chat
snippet.description:
In this demonstration, I use GitHub Copilot Inline Chat in VSCode to create a new Python script that:
- call the GitHub API to get the top 3 repositories of a user/organization
- return the list as text, then refactored to return JSON list

snippet.title: Building function from Spring Boot annotation using Copilot completion in IntelliJ
snippet.description: Creation of a new method through completion, the name, parameters, and code of this function are generated from a simple Spring Boot annotation.

snippet.title: Asking Copilot, in French, how to create and publish container images
snippet.description: This sample show how GitHub Copilot Chat can help a developer to write a workflow.

snippet.title: Moving from Shell to Terraform with GitHub Copilot
snippet.description:
In this demonstration I show how to take a Shell script file that contains many call to the Azure CLI tool (az) to create resources and convert this to a set of Terraform files.

In addition to the convertion from Shell to Terraform with Azure, I am also asking for suggestion for Terraform file for AWS Deployment.

snippet.title: Converting a Spring Boot Java REST class to Python with Flask with Copilot
snippet.description: In this demonstration I am using GitHub Copilot to propose a new implementation of a Java Spring Boot REST Controller in Python with Flask and use SQLAlchemy for the database access

snippet.title: Finding, Explaining, Testing and Fixing Code Vulnerability with GitHub Copilot
snippet.description:
In this demonstration I use GitHub Copilot in IntelliJ to find some vulnerability in a class, this does NOT replace the security control done in your CI/CD platform!)
Once the vulnerabilities found, Copilot explain how to fix it, test the fix.

This is done in a Java Spring Boot Application (Petclinic) in IntelliJ.

snippet.title: Generate new test in VSCode with Copilot
snippet.description: In this demonstration I use GitHub Copilot to create new test, and add test to my existing test.

snippet.title: Generate Documentation and Comments for Typescript function
snippet.description: In this demonstration I use Copilot to add some JavaScript Documentation for a method, and add comments in the code.

snippet.title: Securing & Refactoring in VSCode with Copilot
snippet.description:
In this demonstration, I use Copilot Chat in VS Code to refactor some code:
- extract all SQL queries  database interactions from an API Controller into a new Repository Class
- Rework the SQL Queries when they are not save commenting them with some explanation
- Add Try Catch block in the new code for exception management

snippet.title: Create a TypeScript class from functionnal specifications, in French
snippet.description: In this demonstration, I use VSCode and GitHub Copilot to use a specification, written in French, and create a new TypeScript Class that respects the specifications.

snippet.title: Simplifying code with GitHub Copilot
snippet.description:
This short demonstration shows how to simplify some code with Copilot 
- in IntelliJ using right click menu and inline chat
- in VSCode using Chat
